What can I say its csgo

A majority of my hours in this game were played from 2012-2016. After returning this year, I believe this is still a quality competitve shooting game whose overall system sucks you in, I think it has lost a significant amount of it's touch and charm.

A fun experience in this game will be difficult for newer players as the lower ranks are saturated with alt accounts who should be ranked much higher. Game is not worth playing unless you pay for the protected matchmaking.
